summary: Almaty is Kazakhstan's biggest city, with over two million people. It was the country's capital until 1997 when the government moved it to Astana. Almaty was an important city during the Soviet era. It is now a major center for business, culture, and finance. The city is located in a beautiful mountain area near Kyrgyzstan. Almaty is known for its music and is part of UNESCO's Creative Cities Network.
title: Almaty
